title: My High School Christmas Boyfriend
description: A boy A dance A disappearing act A lost shoe A wicked Great Aunt  There I was, starring in my very own fairytale, dancing with a handsome stranger at the Christmas Winter Dance. But then, in a Cinderella reversal, he was gone! And I was left musing over the boy who had set my heart on fire.  Can I find him again, and will I get my happy ending with the boy from the Christmas Dance?
author: Kylie Key
